ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | istpsi.b | |- ( Base ` K ) = A |
| 2 |  | istpsi.j | |- ( TopOpen ` K ) = J |
| 3 |  | istpsi.1 | |- A = U. J |
| 4 |  | istpsi.2 | |- J e. Top |
| 5 | 1 | #P_eqcomi | |- A = ( Base ` K ) |
| 6 | 2 | #P_eqcomi | |- J = ( TopOpen ` K ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_istps2 | |- ( K e. TopSp <-> ( J e. Top /\ A = U. J ) ) |
| 8 | 4, 3, 7 | #P_mpbir2an | |- K e. TopSp |
